com.jackrl.bomberguygame.domain

Class Enemy

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jackrl.bomberguygame.domain.Entity
      • com.jackrl.bomberguygame.domain.Enemy

  • public class Enemy
extends Entity

    The class that represents the enemies in the game. Touching them will kill the player

    Probably will make it an abstract class from which inherit the different enemies

    The collisions has to be thought over. Will be united with the ones of the player if possible

        ArrayList<Wall> walls,
        ArrayList<Block> blocks,

        Method that takes care of the movement of the enemy.
        Parameters:
        delta - time since last update
        walls - array containing the walls that are in the level
        blocks - array containing the blocks that are in the level
        bombs - array containing the bombs that are in the level
